price: 103. Miso ekomonaka(1) ye te kasi ye nde akomona mpe azali malamu atonda bansango.
arabic: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
footnotes: 1 Miso ekomonaka ye te: Awa na mokili, kasi na mokolo ya suka bandimi bokomona Nkolo na bango, kasi na mobimba naye te.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā tud'rikuhu al-abṣāru wahuwa yud'riku al-abṣāra wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
